00058   template<typename TPoint, typename TSize>
00059   class HyperRectDomain_Iterator
00060   {
00061     public:
00062       typedef std::bidirectional_iterator_tag iterator_category; 
00063       typedef TPoint value_type;
00064       typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00065       typedef TPoint* pointer;
00066       typedef TPoint& reference;
00067                         typedef TSize Size;

00070       HyperRectDomain_Iterator( const TPoint & p, const TPoint& lower, const TPoint &upper )
00071           : myPoint( p ), mylower( lower ), myupper( upper ),  myCurrentPos( 0 ),
00072           myUseSubDomain( false )
00073       {
00074         ASSERT( lower <= upper );
00075         ASSERT( lower <= p && p <= upper );
00076       }
00077 
00078 #ifdef CPP0X_INITIALIZER_LIST
00079       HyperRectDomain_Iterator(const TPoint & p, const TPoint& lower,
00080           const TPoint &upper,
00081           std::initializer_list<Size> subDomain)
00082           : myPoint( p ), mylower( lower ), myupper( upper ),  myCurrentPos( 0 ),
00083           myUseSubDomain( true )
00084       {
00085         ASSERT( lower <= upper );
00086         ASSERT( lower <= p && p <= upper );
00087         ASSERT( subDomain.size() <= TPoint::Dimension );
00088         mySubDomain.reserve( subDomain.size() );
00089         for ( const unsigned int *c = subDomain.begin();
00090             c != subDomain.end(); ++c )
00091         {
00092           ASSERT( *c <= TPoint::Dimension );
00093           mySubDomain.push_back( *c );
00094         }

00102           : myPoint( p ), mylower( lower ), myupper( upper ),  myCurrentPos( 0 ),
00103           myUseSubDomain( true )

00106         ASSERT( lower <= p && p <= upper );

00120       const TPoint & operator*() const
00121       {
00122         // pb for reverse iterator ASSERT(mylower<=myPoint && myPoint<=myupper); // we must be between [begin,end]
00123         return myPoint;
00124       }

00130       bool operator== ( const HyperRectDomain_Iterator<TPoint,TSize> &it ) const
00131       {
00132         return ( myPoint == ( *it ) );

00141         return ( myPoint != ( *aIt ) );

00148       void nextLexicographicOrder()
00149       {
00150         myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) ++;
00151         if (( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension - 1 ) &&
00152             ( myPoint.at( myCurrentPos )  >  myupper.at( myCurrentPos ) ) )
00153         {
00154           do
00155           {
00156             myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) = mylower.at( myCurrentPos );
00157             myCurrentPos++;
00158             if ( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension )
00159               myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) ++;
00160           }
00161           while (( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension - 1 ) &&
00162               ( myPoint.at( myCurrentPos )  >  myupper.at( myCurrentPos ) ) );
00163           myCurrentPos = 0;
00164         }
00165       }
00166 
00171       void nextSubDomainOrder()
00172       {
00173         ASSERT( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() );
00174         myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) ++;
00175 
00176         if ( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() - 1 &&
00177             myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) >
00178             myupper.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) )
00179         {
00180           do
00181           {
00182             myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) =
00183               mylower.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] );
00184             myCurrentPos++;
00185             if ( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() )
00186               myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) ++;
00187           }
00188           while (( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() - 1  ) &&
00189               ( myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] )  >
00190                   myupper.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) ) );
00191           myCurrentPos = 0;
00192         }
00193       }
00194 
00198       HyperRectDomain_Iterator<TPoint,TSize> &operator++()
00199       {
00200         if ( myUseSubDomain )
00201           nextSubDomainOrder();
00202         else
00203           nextLexicographicOrder();
00204         return *this;
00205       }

00222       void prevLexicographicOrder()
00223       {
00224         myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) --;
00225         if (( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension - 1 ) &&
00226             ( myPoint.at( myCurrentPos )  <  mylower.at( myCurrentPos ) ) )
00227         {
00228           do
00229           {
00230             myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) = myupper.at( myCurrentPos );
00231             myCurrentPos++;
00232             if ( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension )
00233               myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) --;
00234           }
00235           while (( myCurrentPos < TPoint::Dimension - 1 ) &&
00236               ( myPoint.at( myCurrentPos )  <  mylower.at( myCurrentPos ) ) );
00237           myCurrentPos = 0;
00238         }
00239       }
00240 
00245       void prevSubDomainOrder()
00246       {
00247         ASSERT( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() );
00248         myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) --;
00249 
00250         if (  myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() - 1 &&
00251             myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] )  <
00252             mylower.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) )
00253         {
00254           do
00255           {
00256             myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) =
00257               myupper.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] );
00258             myCurrentPos++;
00259             if ( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() )
00260               myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) --;
00261           }
00262           while (( myCurrentPos < mySubDomain.size() - 1 ) &&
00263               ( myPoint.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] )  <
00264                   mylower.at( mySubDomain[myCurrentPos] ) ) );
00265           myCurrentPos = 0;
00266         }
00267       }

00273       HyperRectDomain_Iterator<TPoint,TSize> &operator--()
00274       {
00275         if ( myUseSubDomain )
00276           prevSubDomainOrder();
00277         else
00278           prevLexicographicOrder();
00279         return *this;
00280       }
